FROM PRODUCT_TB P JOIN PRODUCT_TAG_TB T ON T.pdt_id = P.pdt_id JOIN TAG_TB TG ON TG.tag_id = T.tag_id JOIN CATEGORY_TB C ON C.pdt_id = P.pdt_id JOIN COMMON_CODE_TB CCT ON CCT.cat_code = C.cat_code JOIN COMMON_CODE_TYPE_TB CCTT ON CCTT.cd_type_id = CCT.cd_type_id WHERE TRUE AND title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY in_date DESC limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
